name: Touring Karts
description:
Touring Karts takes maximum advantage of the possibilities of VR by reinventing KART-type races in the midst of chaos full of action and surprises.
  • Combine your powers! Original mechanisms designed for VR but can be played without VR.
  • More than 500 collectible prizes playing both online multiplayer and by yourself.
  • 3 views to choose: One free of dizziness, a classic one in 3rd person and the immersive first-person view.
  • 22 tracks and 30 customizable cars inspired by real tracks and teams.
  • Quick race mode with all cars and tracks available from the first minute.

VR Parks and Arcades

If you are the owner of VR park visit the web of the game for more details
